refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Closes the device. Any I/O in progress is terminated and resources associated with the file descriptor are freed. However data format parameters, current input or output, control values or other properties remain unchanged.

refsect1.title: Return Value
refsect1.para: The function returns 0 on success, -1 on failure and the errno is set appropriately. Possible error codes:

listitem.para: fd is not a valid open file descriptor.
